column2: "Afei Abram ne yer Sarai ɔnnwo mma no: mbom nna ɔwɔ afonabaa Egyptnyi bi a ne dzin dze Hagar."

column4: EWURADZE esiw me awoo kwan; meserɛ wo
column5: kɔ m’afonabaa nkyɛn; annyɛ a mibenya no ho mba. Na Abram tsiee Sarai ne ndze."

column2: "Na Abram tsenaa Keenan asaase do mfe du n’ekyir no
column3: Abram ne yer Sarai faa n’afonabaa Hagar
column5: na ɔdze no maa no kun Abram awar."

column3: na onyinsenii: na aber a ohun dɛ onyinsen no
Mo mfom da wo do; medze m’afonabaa too wo bo mu
column5: obu me enyimtsia: EWURADZE mbua emi nye ɔwo ntamu atsɛn."
yɛ no dɛ mbrɛ woara ehwɛ a oye no ara. Na Sarai nye no dzii no dzendzenndzen

column2: "Na EWURADZE no bɔfoe hun no wɔ nsunyiwa bi ho wɔ sar do
column3: Sur kwan mu nsunyiwa no ho a."

column4: ifi henfa bae na erokɔ henfa? Na obuaa dɛ
column5: Mifi mo wuraba Sarai n’enyim na muruguan."

column2: "Na EWURADZE no bɔfoe no see no dɛ
column4: na kɛbrɛ woho adze wɔ n’ase."

column2: "Na EWURADZE no bɔfoe no see no dɛ
column4: ma hɔn dodow ntsi wɔkan hɔn a ɔnnkɛyɛ."

column2: "Na EWURADZE no bɔfoe no see no dɛ
column5: na ebɔwo babanyin; na ebɛfrɛ ne dzin Ismael

column2: "Na ɔbɛyɛ dɛ asoaso bɔyafo wɔ adasa mu; ne nsa betsia nyimpa nyinara
column3: na nyimpa nyinara nsa etsia no; na ɔbɔsoɛr etsia no nuanom nyinara."

column2: "Na ɔfrɛɛ EWURADZE a ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ no no ne dzin dɛ
column3: ɔwo yɛ Nyankopɔn a ihu adze: na ɔkaa dɛ
column4: Aso ha ara mpo mehu nyia ohu me yi?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi wɔfrɛɛ bura no Beer-lahai-roi; na
"Na Hagar woo babanyin maa Abram: na Abram frɛɛ ne babanyin a Hagar woo no no ne dzin Ismael."
"Na aber a Hagar woo Ismael no
column3: nna Abram edzi mfe eduowɔtwe esia."
